carbon_black.description: Advanced endpoint security and protection solutions

products.name: Carbon Black App Control
products.short_description: Trusted software enforcement with flexible deployment
products.description: Carbon Black App Control leverages a positive security model allowing only trusted software to run. It can be deployed on-premise, on private and public clouds.
use_cases: Reduce unplanned downtime of critical systems
Prevent unwanted changes to system configs

products.name: Carbon Black EDR
products.short_description: Comprehensive threat detection and response platform
products.description: Carbon Black EDR detects and responds to advanced attacks through a comprehensive and integrated approach for security teams.

products.name: Carbon Black Endpoint Foundation
products.description: NGAV, Behavioral EDR, and Device Control for comprehensive endpoint protection.

products.name: Carbon Black Endpoint Advanced
products.short_description: Advanced endpoint protection with live query and vulnerability management
products.description: Live Query, Vulnerability Management, NGAV, Behavioral EDR, and Device Control for advanced endpoint protection.

products.name: Carbon Black Endpoint Enterprise
products.short_description: Enterprise-grade endpoint protection with advanced features
products.description: Live Query, Vulnerability Management, NGAV, Behavioral EDR, Device Control, and Enterprise EDR for comprehensive enterprise endpoint protection.

products.name: Carbon Black Workload Enterprise
products.description: Enterprise EDR, NGAV, Behavioral EDR, Asset Inventory, Live Query, CIS Benchmarks, vCenter Plug-in, Lifecycle Management, and Vulnerability Management for workload protection.

products.name: Carbon Black eNDR/XDR
products.description: eNDR/XDR for enterprise-grade threat detection and response.

products.name: Carbon Black Host Based Firewall
products.description: Management console to monitor and control network connections from managed endpoints.
features: Increased visibility into network and application behavior
use_cases: Increased visibility into network and application behavior

products.name: Endpoint DLP
products.description: Symantec Endpoint DLP lets you identify sensitive information on endpoints and regulate its flow.

products.name: Network DLP
products.description: Network DLP captures and analyzes traffic on network, detecting confidential data and traffic metadata over specified protocols.

products.name: Storage DLP
products.description: DLP is a set of technologies, products, and techniques that are designed to stop sensitive information from leaving an organization.

products.name: CASB DLP
products.description: DLP helps you understand how your sensitive information is being used, including what data is being handled and by whom.
use_cases: Prevent data loss in the cloud

products.name: SEP-SES
products.description: Symantec Endpoint Security provides advanced protection against modern cyber threats.

products.name: Adaptive Protection
products.description: Adaptive Protection protects enterprise environments from the shift in the threat landscape toward sophisticated and targeted attacks.
features: Living off the Land (LOTL) attack prevention

products.name: AD Threat Defense
products.description: AD breach assessment and threat defense for Active Directory environments.

products.name: Host Integrity
products.description: SEP Host Integrity provides flexible compliance checks and options to automate remediation.

products.name: IPS
products.description: Powerful network-based protection prevents attacks from malicious domains, OS and application vulnerabilities before attackers can touch the file system.

products.name: AML
products.short_description: Advanced machine learning for threat prevention
products.description: SEP leverages machine learning for prevention, especially when not connected to the cloud.

products.name: MTM (Mobile Threat Management)
products.description: Symantec provides best-in-class protection for mobile devices that covers OS vulnerabilities and suspicious and malicious apps as well as risky Wi-Fi identification and protection.

products.name: GEM (Generic Exploit Mitigation)
products.description: SEP pre-emptively blocks exploits using heap spray techniques, abuse of java security manager, etc., and works regardless of flaw/bug/vulnerability.

products.name: IS - Suspicious Detection
products.description: Detects any suspicious files in your network based on the intensity level that is set in the Intensive Protection policy.

products.name: Tamper Protection
products.description: SEP has powerful tamper protection that monitors SEP processes, files, and registry keys and prevents malware or users from disabling endpoint protection.

products.name: Threat Hunting
products.description: Decades of threat intelligence and security experts automate threat hunting and provide additional customer-specific context.

products.name: TAA
products.description: SEDR provides precise detections from time-tested Targeted Attack Analytics, based on global activity of the good and the bad across all customer enterprises that comprise the telemetry set.

products.name: Sandboxing
products.description: Cynic is included in SES Complete. Cynic supports PE, Documents, and PS1, etc. Symantec has the option of on-prem Malware Analysis Appliance for on-prem EDR.

products.name: EDR
products.description: Symantec EPP and EDR are both available for cloud, on-prem, and hybrid deployments.
use_cases: Deploy on cloud, on-prem, or hybrid

products.name: SPE - NAS
products.description: Provides defense-in-depth protection of storage and protects sensitive data stored in centralized repositories from hackers and infection.

products.name: SPE - CS
products.description: Protects important business data and tools/utilities residing on storage devices that need malware protection.

products.name: DCS
products.description: Provides IDS, system hardening, logon/logoff monitoring, configuration monitoring, and least privilege access control.

proxy.description: Advanced network and web protection solutions

products.name: CloudSOC CASB
products.description: Protects data leak from endpoints and provides visibility into cloud applications.

products.name: Network Protection Suite
products.short_description: Safe internet browsing and SSL/TLS interception
products.description: A single product with multiple implementations; on-premises, cloud, or hybrid. It includes multiple features and components used to protect networks, clients, and servers from today's malicious traffic while allowing safe interaction with all available applications from any location.

products.name: Reverse Proxy
products.short_description: Protection for internally hosted web servers
products.description: Protect, secure, and accelerate web applications and websites hosted in customer premises/data centers.

products.name: Proxy on Cloud - SaaS
products.short_description: Safe internet browsing and SSL/TLS interception
products.description: A single product with multiple implementations; on-premises, cloud, or hybrid. It includes multiple features and components used to protect networks, clients, and servers from today's malicious traffic while allowing safe interaction with all available applications from any location.

products.name: Cloud Firewall Service - SaaS
products.description: Firewall policies are available in the cloud for all non-Web-based traffic, allowing administrators to filter traffic according to user and layer four port.
use_cases: Control traffic by user and port

products.name: Deep File Inspection - Content Analysis - On Premise
products.description: File-based malware detection and Machine Learning with the Content Analysis licensing for Edge SWG and Cloud SWG.

products.name: Deep File Inspection - Content Analysis - Cloud/SaaS
products.description: File-based malware detection and Machine Learning with the Content Analysis licensing for Edge SWG and Cloud SWG.

products.name: High Risk or Full Web Isolation
products.short_description: Protection from harmful and unknown web URLs
products.description: Execution of all web sessions away from endpoints, sending only a safe rendering of information to users’ browsers. This prevents any website-delivered, zero-day malware from reaching user devices.

products.name: Malware Analysis - Only on SaaS
products.description: File-based malware detection, Machine Learning, and cloud-based sandboxing and remote file detonation is included with the Content Analysis licensing for Cloud SWG.

products.name: ZTNA
products.description: ZTNA eliminates inbound connections to customer networks (and the need for a VPN) and creates a software-defined perimeter (SDP) between users and applications. Only authorized users can connect to specific applications while making applications invisible to attackers.

products.name: SSLV
products.description: The SSL Visibility Appliance is an integral component to any organization’s traffic management strategy, providing visibility into encrypted traffic that ensures attacks cannot slip by undetected.

products.name: DX NetOps
products.description: Network events, fault management, performance monitoring, and configuration management.

products.name: AppNeta
products.description: Digital Experience Monitoring with hop-by-hop network path analysis.

products.name: Clarity
products.description: Centralized planning and prioritization, resource optimization, reporting, and insights.

products.name: Rally
products.description: Agile development, release planning & management, defect management & quality assurance.

products.name: Automic Automation
products.description: Manage complex workloads across platforms, ERPs, and business apps spanning on-premises, hybrid, and multi-cloud environments.

products.name: Autosys Workload Automation
products.description: Automated data transfers, nightly reports & analytics, data backup & recovery.

products.name: Security Analytics
products.description: Improves network visibility, inspection, and forensics to accelerate incident response and remediation.

products.name: SMG / ESS
products.description: Email protection against spam and malicious emails.

products.name: PGP Endpoint
products.short_description: Drive encryption and whole disk encryption
products.description: Data protection through drive encryption and whole disk encryption.

products.name: VIP
products.description: Application protection through multifactor authentication.

products.name: SiteMinder
products.description: SSO, OAUTH, SAML for secure authentication.

products.name: VIP Authentication Hub
products.description: SSO, OAUTH, SAML, FIDO2, MFA, Risk-Based Auth for secure authentication.

products.name: VIP SaaS
products.description: SSO, OAUTH, SAML, FIDO2, MFA for secure SaaS authentication.

products.name: Advanced Authentication
products.description: SSO, MFA for secure authentication.

products.name: Identity Suite
products.description: Identity Lifecycle Management, Identity Governance, User Service Portal, User Provisioning.

products.name: PAM
products.description: Password Vault, Privilege Access Management for secure access control.

products.name: CA Directory
products.description: User directory for identity management.

products.name: CA Service Desk
products.description: Helps IT teams manage incidents, problems, changes, and service requests efficiently.
